title: Flourless Pumpkin Brownies (Vegan, Gluten Free)
directions: In a food processor , add all the ingredients. Blend until smooth.
Line a loaf pan with parchment paper.
Pour batter into the loaf pan .
Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let cool before removing from pan and cutting.
ingredients: 1 cup almond butter (or nut butter of choice)
1/2 cup cacao powder OR cocoa powder
